name: fremove
notes: Files that are currently open (fopen) must be closed first (fclose) to be deleted.
warnings: The file path must be valid.

params_body.name: name[]
params_body.description: The path of the file to delete. (NOTE: NOT a file handle)

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The file doesn't exist, or you don't have permission to delete it.
related_fn:
fopen: Open a file.
 fclose: Close a file.
 ftemp: Create a temporary file stream.
 fremove: Remove a file.
 fwrite: Write to a file.
 fread: Read a file.
 fputchar: Put a character in a file.
 fgetchar: Get a character from a file.
 fblockwrite: Write blocks of data into a file.
 fblockread: Read blocks of data from a file.
 fseek: Jump to a specific character in a file.
 flength: Get the file length.
 fexist: Check, if a file exists.
 fmatch: Check, if patterns with a file name matches.
